Headline: Yellow Line Running with Delays; Boarding change at Howard
ShortDescription: Yellow Line service running w/delays due to track conditions at Howard; board/exit all trains on the 95th-bound side at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line service running w/delays due to track conditions at Howard; board/exit all trains on the 95th-bound side at Howard.

Dempster/Skokie-bound trains are departing from this platform due to track conditions at Howard.
